Package com.jcabi.dynamodb.core

Core package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Instances
    Running instances of DynamoDB Local.
    Tables
    Handles DynamoDB locations.

Package com.jcabi.dynamodb.core Description

Core package. Logic of the plugin should be extracted from maven mojos to this package to allow directly running local dynamodb.

0.8
